hi and welcome you listening to the x22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1435 a.n today's date is
November 29th 2017 and the tide of the
episode is the central banks just
signaled the collapse is right around
the corner let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now last month
the Department of Commerce they came out
and they were telling the world you know
this is what Americans are spending
their money on and in the third quarter
the biggest driver of marginal spending
was on car sales technically if we look
at it its Motor Vehicles and parts which
increased by fifteen point six billion
to four hundred and sixty three point
five billion now once again that was the
beginning of the third quarter then we
had the hurricanes and of course they
had to revise these numbers which again
the hurricane does not hit the entire
country it hits States and it hits small
portions of the state and as we can see
there was a hurricane in Florida that
was one in Texas and at this point they
were saying okay let's revise these
numbers here we are at the end of the
third quarter let's revise them and
we're gonna show that well Americans
really didn't spend their money on motor
vehicles they spent their money on
health insurance now now remember when
you purchase a car people are not laying
out 30 40 50 60 thousand dollars there
they're borrowing this money they're
taking out loans when they purchase
health care they're actually spending
their hard-earned money and it looks
like health care well it took the lead
and the reason for this is because
premiums skyrocketed and remember health
care which is also known as Obamacare
well it contributes to GDP and the
higher the number the better it is and
we can see that they revised motor
vehicles it looks like for that time
period it was about a hundred
and nine billion healthcare spending was
around 200 or so billion almost double
and we see at this point health care has
been leading the way in what Americans
are spending their money on they're not
spending it in retail they're not
spending it on homes they're not
spending it they're spending it on
health care and this should tell you
something that we have a major problem
because again if we strip away health
care we strip away the manipulation
what's left in the GDP numbers
absolutely nothing now the corporate
media the government they're out there
telling us that pending home sales jump
the most in eight months and of course
this is on the hurricane rebound they
had a show that Oh see look what
happened everything is back on track now
of course these pending home sales
they're manipulated they're fake and
you're trying to tell me throughout the
summer because remember if we go back a
couple of months one two three four
months or so we've had declining pending
home sales and all of a sudden it shoots
up out of nowhere and once again this
numbers coming from the south which is
up by seven point four percent now
remember they've been manipulating the
housing market making us believe that
everything is fine they did this back in
2006 2007 2008 with the subprime
securities where yes everyone believed
the housing market was absolutely
perfect it was going to continue on and
nothing was going to change except when
it did and the entire market came
crashing down and many people were
underwater many people lost their homes
many foreclosures many short sales and
people never really recovered now
they've pushed the bubbles in 20
different cities by manipulating certain
factors and they drove prices back up
not for the whole country but certain
areas to make everyone believe that
everything is fine but we can see
already things aren't fine because we've
been looking through all of the
propaganda and we are seeing the economy
is deteriorating very very quickly now
Janet
Ellen was out there she was testifying
in front of Congress and once before she
said that we were not gonna see a crisis
again in our lifetime like we saw back
in 2008 now she went a step further and
of course everyone laughed and said yeah
that means something's coming even I
said this and it does mean that
something's coming well she took this a
step further and she used the c-word and
what I mean by the c-word is that word
contained and we know that Ben Bernanke
used the word contain months before we
had the recession where he said the
housing the subprime it's all contained
so she was out there she prepared
remarks ahead of what may be her last
that parents before Congress and she
came out saying that the economic

across sectors as well as across much of

to continue gradually raising interest
rates and trimming the balance sheet
although asset valuations are high by
historical standards overall
vulnerabilities in the financial sector
appear moderate as the banking system is

contained and once again she just
signaled that we are headed into a major

track that there where they convince us
that we're not going to see a crisis
where everything is contained and
everything is great that means that
we're heading into a collapse scenario a

Bernanke was out there assuring America

see a recession our forecasting one
nothing's on their radar everything is

the month of October
guess what they brought the system down
all of a sudden
everything crashed of course they blame

and of course this was created by the

is very worried they understand that
this system is coming down China

they're worried that they're going to

now the question is why did he say this

they know that the new system is being

remember their corporation is privately

everything is about to shift to

the system that we're in today never

you couldn't even run the
their system we shouldn't trust you with
